casename: The Law Society of Singapore v Lee Cheong Hoh
coram: Chao Hick Tin JA; L P Thean JA; Yong Pung How CJ
counsel: Simon Yuen (Tan & Lim) for the Law Society; Michael Khoo SC (Michael Khoo & Partners) for the respondent
tags-parsed: Legal Profession/Show cause action/Solicitor sharing professional fees with unqualified person/Whether payment to employee constitutes gratification or commission for procuring business for solicitor/Appropriate penalty/ss 83(2)(d) & (e) Legal Profession Act (Cap 161, 1997 Ed)
